Message:
On the way home,
these men in black suddenly
appeared and surrounded us.

Every man was shouting,
their eyes cast onto Priscilla.

Having no idea
who these men were,
I drew my sword and
ran towards them.

But I was powerless...
There were simply
too many of them.

Injured, I kneeled helplessly
as one of the men came to
finish me off.

It was then that
Priscilla screamed,
and flames engulfed
everything around us.
